title: PACT Emissions Scope Breakdown Extension Schema
description: A Pathfinder Data Model Extension to provide detailed breakdown of greenhouse gas emissions by GHG Protocol scopes (Scope 1, 2, and 3).

description.description: Description of the scope breakdown methodology or context

Scope1.description: Direct GHG emissions from sources owned or controlled by the organization

Scope2.description: Indirect GHG emissions from the generation of purchased electricity, steam, heating, and cooling

Scope3.description: All other indirect GHG emissions that occur in the value chain of the organization
